source:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
The strong-willed wife taps her foot in impatience.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
スティルタイドの気の強そうな女は、誰かを待っているようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_TODO_00<tab>クラックシェル海岸で気の弱そうな男を探す

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the oversized tideclam to the hesitant husband.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_TODO_02<tab>気の弱そうな男に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EF001 /var>を渡す
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_TODO_03<tab>スティルタイドの気の強そうな女と話す

source:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_000<tab>Of all the useless...
You there, have you seen a timid mouse of a man cowerin' in a corner somewhere?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_000<tab>まったく……！
あんた、その辺で気の弱そうな男、見なかったかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_001<tab>I'm talkin' about my husband─clumsy, overcautious clod that he is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_001<tab>そうかい。
ま、あたしの旦那なんだけどね。
度胸もなければ、手先も不器用な男さ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_002<tab>All I asked was for him to bring some shellfish back for dinner, and he's been gone for bloody hours!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_002<tab>浜辺で食糧になる貝を、
いくつか拾ってこいって頼んだだけなのに、
ちっとも帰ってきやしないよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_003<tab>I hate to inflict my troubles on a stranger, but if you're headed down to the beach and spot my good-for-nothin' husband, tell him to get a move on with the main course!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_003<tab>あんた、悪いんだけどさ。
浜辺に行く用事があったら、旦那に声をかけてほしいんだ。
頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_004<tab>If you find yourself down on the sands for whatever reason, please keep an eye out for my missin' husband. Just look for the bloke what's shakin' at his own shadow.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_004<tab>あんた、悪いんだけどさ。
浜辺に行く用事があったら、旦那に声をかけてほしいんだ。
頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_010<tab>Wh-Who are you? Wh-What do you want with me?
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_011<tab>The wife's wondering where I am? H-Has it been that long...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_011<tab>女房が私の帰りが遅いと心配を？
し、しまった、もうこんな時間か……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_012<tab><sigh> I tried to dig up one of those tideclams that she likes─a good-sized one, too─but a claw shot out from under the sand and almost clipped my arm off...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_012<tab>はぁ……実は、女房の好きな貝を採ろうとしたんですが、
砂の下に魔物が潜んでいて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_013<tab>Say, you seem the capable sort. Do...do you think you could lend me a hand?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_013<tab>女房のために、何としてもあの貝を持ち帰りたいんです……。
あのう、あなた腕に自信がありそうですが、
よかったら……手を貸していただけませんか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_014<tab>Oh, thank you! You should be able to find the spot I was digging not far from the water. Just watch out for those snippers!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_014<tab>あ、ありがとうございます！
では、この海岸で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EF001 /var>」を採ってください！
魔物が潜んでいますので、くれぐれもご注意を……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_015<tab>The clam I was trying to get was over there, closer to the water. We'll be feasting well tonight if you can claim it from those ghastly claws!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_015<tab>この海岸で、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EF001 /var>」を採ってください！
魔物が潜んでいますので、くれぐれもご注意を……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_020<tab>Y-You're not missing a limb or anything, are you?
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_021<tab>Yes, look at the size of this thing! My wife will be well pleased.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_021<tab>ありがとうございます！
女房の大好物なんです……あぁ、喜ぶだろうなぁ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_022<tab>She'll be mad that I had to ask for your help, but...ah, it'll be worth it when she sees the prize you claimed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_022<tab>きっとあなたに頼ったことで怒られてしまいますが、
女房が喜んでくれれば、私は嬉しいんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_023<tab>In fact, I'm sure she'll want to thank you in person. Come on─let's head back to the village!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_000_023<tab>さあ、女房がお礼をしたがると思いますので、
ぜひ村に寄って行ってください！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_030<tab>My apologies, stranger─it seems my husband caused you more trouble than I expected.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_030<tab>迷惑かけちまったみたいで、すまなかったねぇ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_031<tab>Aye, you're a proper pain in the posterior, you are! Here, take this and drop it off at the Leaky Keel!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_031<tab>ほんっとうに、グズなんだから！
次は配達の仕事だよ、さっさと行ってきな！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_032<tab>I hear you slew some shelled monster what came between him and that clam. A good thing, too─if he'd stood his ground, I'd be buryin' whatever parts of him was left.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_032<tab>聞いたよ。
あんたが魔物を倒してくれたんだってね。
あの人のことだから、ドジ踏んで命を落としていたかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_033<tab>Thank you... The man has his faults, but strike me if I don't love him all the same.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_033<tab>あんな頼りない男でも、惚れた相手なんだ……ありがとうね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_034<tab>Now, I'd best be makin' somethin' to fill his belly when he comes back. A nice thick clam stew, I reckon!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERWOMAN03351_000_034<tab>さ、疲れて帰ってくる旦那のために、
とっておきのシチューでも作ってやるとするかね。
もちろん、あんたたちが採ってきてくれた貝を入れてね！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_100_030<tab>Th-Thank you again, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I might still be floundering about on the sands if it weren't for you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA009_03351_VILLAGERMAN03351_100_030<tab>あっ、旅人さん……
さきほどは、ありがとうございました。
